title: Ticket #5518: Document application-level checkpoint support in the Vanilla Universe
description: There's a good start at ExperimentalSupportForPeriodicCheckpointingInVanillaUniverse, but that will have to expanded and made part of the manual, plus the new constants and attributes will have to be documented, etc.
